svg.text: SAGA PRYOR DATA CENTER - ELECTRICAL SINGLE LINE DIAGRAM
13.8kV Dual Ring MV Distribution with Individual Breaker Positions
Woodward Paralleling Controls | Auto Load Share
Protects Chillers, Pumps, CDUs, CRAH Units
1. All breaker positions shown with breaker symbols at each connection point
2. Each RMU enables ring reconfiguration for concurrent maintainability
3. Dual ring topology (Ring A/Ring B) provides N path redundancy
4. N+1 redundancy for generators, transformers, and UPS systems
5. Each LV switchboard serves dual-fed distribution panels for cabinet PDUs
6. Total IT capacity: 6.2 MVA | Total mechanical: 2.0 MW
